display.title: Glendalough
display.description:
Glendalough might be my favorite village in Ireland.This tinny village is situated in the Wiclow mountains. The village itself has an ancient cemetery and a church with one of those huge Irish stone round towers. They don't make it anymore Irish then this.

Two kilometers away from the village there are two lakes, a waterfall and a beautiful glacial valley.There are parking lots by the lakes and places to have a picnic. I would book a full day for the lakes, the valley and the monastery.
